Buen juego:
Contras:
-A veces encontrarás jugadores que juegan para ganar puntos y no para colaborar.
-A veces encontrarás asesinos que campean a un jugador que colgó

Pros (algunos, no podría nombrarlos todos):
-Puedes jugarlo en un microondas.
-Bajo precio (y hay ofertas, que aparecen frecuentemente)
-Puedes comprar personajes con dinero del juego sin tener que sacar de tu bolsillo real.

puntos extra:
-Los desarrolladores están constantemente lanzando contenido nuevo.

我算是双边玩家 首先是屎一样的匹配机制 绿段屠夫能给我排4红车队 打完还nm嘲讽 玩人吧 还总有屠夫守尸 或者萌新没怀表不挡刀贴着屠夫脸救人 但是上段是真的轻松 玩屠夫 白天还好 晚上基本都是速修车队 尤其是韩国车队 嘲讽的叭叭响 不守尸不高配红处就等着四跑  还能被板子给我砸地里  游戏以前确实不错 现在也被各种弱智平衡和脑瘫玩家搞的是真的不行  我是来打游戏不是来看nm树下孝子跟听叮叮叮五声门一拉结束来拉血压的  不推荐 萌新入手是没有教程的 进去就拉血压就完事了

This video game does for sure have its ups and downs. I previously played it on my console and now recently switched to playing on a computer (Saying this due to my hours on pc). The game is extremely toxic when you are not in the greatest mood but can be a great laugh when you are. With friends it is especially fun, as alone the jump scares will make you shit yourself when you are focused on the game. I do recommend buying this game if you would like a game where playing will make you experience all sorts of emotions. But please beware, the game might cost you. It might cause you to either break a keyboard when the killer is playing on a vpn and glitching like crazy, but the rage from this game might even cost you a lot more. But no let's not talk about the rage bit concerning money problems, because the only people that are going to break something are content creators.

The game is fun, 10/10 recommend if you are a horror fan, you will need to be competitive and skilled tho.. Just practice.

Big Booba Lady

Asymmetrical horror-themed game with interesting mechanics, but with a toxic playerbase and incompetent developers. Let's begin.
You can play 2 opposite game modes:

KILLER
You will impersonate one between 20+ killers, with the objective of killing the opposing 4 survivors. You can only count on yourself, your killer-unique power and on 4 perks that you will choose at the beginning of the game (more about that later). Since you are alone, you will have to be super efficient in order to stop survivors from achieving their escape, and sometimes this will be impossible. The learning curve is very steep, expect to rage A LOT and prepare to face extremely toxic teams of survivors. When the game will be in your favor, expect the survivors to act toxic and make the game very unpleasant. Also, most of the good perks are only obtainable by buying licensed killers, so if you want to enjoy the game the real price is much higher than 20 $. Oh yeah, there are killers from classic horror franchises, such as Michael Myers, Freddy Krueger, Leatherface and many more, but you will have to pay real money for these guys.

SURVIVOR
Impersonate a survivor that will try to escape with the help of 3 other survivors. Repair 5 generators scattered around the map, search chests and, of course, don't get caught by the killer. You will be able to choose 4 perks between 60+ , but you will most likely choose the same 4 unbalanced perks every game.
The most broken thing about survivors is that they can invite friends in the team, making the so called "Survive With Friends (SFW)". A team of 4 players able to communicate in real time makes a lot of perks useless and hinders the power of many killers. The game was clearly NOT created and balanced with this mechanic in mind, so a well coordinated SFW will always beat a decent killer.

BALANCE
Playing survivor is far less demanding on your nerves, since the objective is spread across 4 people, while the killer is alone and every mistake will cost him time. The most useful survivor perks are free, while the killer's are not. Many maps are poorly designed and are either killer or survivor sided (most are the latter). There are elements of the game that will turn the game into a joke, I'm talking about Keys (survivor) and Moris (killer). The game developers have often shown in these years that they don't play their own game, thus making very poor choices in terms of balance. 

CONCLUSION
This game has enormous potential, too bad it's wasted by the devs. I suggest you buy this game when it's on discount, since you will have to pay more money for the DLC's anyway.
If you are a person that gets offended easily, you MUST turn your profile to private and disable the game chat, otherwise prepare to receive the worst insults from salty players.
